sharpRISK aims transforming risk management in the manufacturing industry. 
It combines well established risk identification and mitigation approaches with new natural language processing capabilities.

sharpRISK can be fully tested at its [demo site](https://red-datafactory.shinyapps.io/sharprisk/)
